caption: Table 1. Comparison with previous work on Human3.6M evaluated on the averaged joint error (in millimeters) on reconstructed poses.

Table 2. Comparison results on MPII for single person 2D pose 
estimation using the PCKh measure with respect to 0.2 and 0.5 of 
the head size. For older results, please refer to the MPII Leader 
Board at http://human-pose.mpi-inf.mpg.de.
